TopicTitle: KSP covered on ABC kids gamer TV show in Australia!

Articles.Content:
http://www.abc.net.au/abc3/goodgamesp/transcripts/s3291066.htm

Skip to about 4:30 to catch the KSP.

KSP has made it on TV! Way to go guys!

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

*clap clap clap*

Cool, but its only one tv show.

I, for one, welcome our new Aussie overlords!

Congrats on even more publicity.

Congratulations fellas..

I\'m Aussie, and if not for that ABC kids show, I never would have known about KSP. My 6 yr old daughter begged me to download it, and ironically I\'m the one that ended up playing it for days.

Expect alot more people signing up thanks to that tv show, in fact this reminds me of the early minecraft days. I wish you guys all the best and hope all the hard work pays off.
yeah good game is a good source for actual gamers hosting a review show

Also itâ€™s worth noting we ignored the fins and aerodynamic stuff, it always just seemed to make things worse, lots of power seems to be the real trick.

From the mouths of babes and TV presenters...

From the mouths of babes and TV presenters...

Hehe, actually found that comment pretty funny; it\'s the Kerbal way (usually), after all.

Though, they were using a much earlier version of KSP, from the video, which was a version or few behind when they actually added moving control surfaces.
Yep, KSP was on Good Game about 2/3 mnths ago,,That\'s when i joined the ranks. Never looked back (or down)

this is how i first found the game was watching an episode and saw them playing around with funny looking rockets and kept looking for the game, when i finally found it i couldnt stop laughing at the random rockets possible to make. this is probably the most fun game i had played in ages!

Yep, KSP was on Good Game about 2/3 mnths ago,,That\'s when i joined the ranks. Never looked back (or down)

Me too, I was on summer holidays saw this mad rocket game on the Good Game tv show, it was free & looked a lot of fun. Downloaded it straight away, paid the donation now cant leave it alone! Best 10 bucks I ever spent.

I would like to see the Good Game team achieve orbit though...

Although I do love their enthusiasm for 'more boosters'.... 8)
Wow, this really is getting a lot of publicity!
